message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $14,000. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $13,000?
Thanks for your reply, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking to get closer to $14,000 for it. Could you do $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could you possibly lower the price to $13,200?
